channel.title: How do I change my combat to level 1
channel.description:
Right, I've asked this befor to day already and I just got back aload of shit... So how do I change my combat to level 1 on my server and if eny on says you cant do it yes you can because its a lad done it on a server.
Thanks for looking.
And alot more thanks if you help I would rep++ you if I could but I aint got eny rep++ yet lol ;D

item.title: How do I change my combat to level 1
item.dc:creator: @Mosh_On Mosh_On
item.description:
@Mosh_On wrote:

[quote=“Ape Atoll Escape, post:2, topic:219326”][quote author=bo4rdman link=topic=288136.msg2328927#msg2328927 date=1215809740]
Right, I’ve asked this befor to day already and I just got back aload of shit… So how do I change my combat to level 1 on my server and if eny on says you cant do it yes you can because its a lad done it on a server.

Thanks for looking.

And alot more thanks if you help I would rep++ you if I could but I aint got eny rep++ yet lol ;D
[/quote]

THAT IS IT FUCK YOU ALL DO ANY OF U ACTUALLY READ THE FUCKING RULES THIS SHIT IS PATHETIC!!!

EDIT ONE OF YOUR OLD POST FUCK FACE…

I DONT EVEN NO WHY I FUCKING BOTHER WITH THIS FUCKED UP SHIT!
[center] You sent me a pm asking me do i know how to moderate because of all the ‘noobs’ spamming in this section, so i thought i’d come have a look and found a noob spamming shit and muted him :)[/center][/quote]

^lol wow…

Anyway. you need to edit your Playerhandler.java to make it when you start out that all your stats are level 1 with an initial exp of 0. so basiclly you have to edit your original hp level

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change my combat to level 1
